author: David Appleton
comment: Even though the creator of "Wear Mini Launcher" has now added a brightness slider to his app, this is staying on my watch because if I can't see the screen I can't see a brightness slider; but I CAN say "OK Google, Start Brightness" and this app gives me a single tap to Max brightness. Tasker support would be awesome if the developer could get that working in future.
title: So handy!

author: Web DesignInc
comment: Perfect app for turning on Max brightness while in direct sunlight when your screen isn't viewable enough to navigate to the brightness setting.
title: Excellent
